title: lowercase tall font
author: tjoppru

comments.content: A squooshed [Savoye](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317132023/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/savoye) should do the job.

It looks like a regular Savoye would work...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317132023im_/http:/typophile.com/files/wedo1_4596.jpg)
(welll maybe not. Didn't see it full size until posted)
Thanks I think that will do fine.
